name: It's A Big Lake
description:
A short exploration game about diversity, made in about an hour as a proof of concept during Sabine Harrer's workshop "Radical Game Design With Bitsy" as part of the PLAY18 Festival.

Made with Bitsy, freely available here.

Ein kurzes Erkundungsspiel über Diversität, entstanden in etwa einer Stunde bei Sabine Harrers Workshop "Radical Game Design With Bitsy" während des PLAY18 Festivals in Hamburg.

Erstellt mit dem Tool Bitsy, das hier frei verfügbar ist.
